channel.title: Correction to Flock of Familiars
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Correction to Flock of Familiars"

item.title: Re: Correction to Flock of Familiars
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the heads up! The page has been updated. This is generally a good place to let us know any errors we need to correct. There's not a great system in place to inform us otherwise considering how long a dedicated "corrections" thread would become.

item.title: Correction to Flock of Familiars
item.content:encoded: In the Warlock spells subcategory level 2 spells, the Flock of Familiars spell says that it is not concentration, but then upon reading the spells description, it does in fact require concentration. Sorry if this isn't the place for me to tell you this, I don't know how this shit works.
